metadata.name: ToneControl 20yrs #002
metadata.description:
A monitor is a sound breather; but the one that the producer listens to to create it's magic. This version has a red/orange glance.

Artwork inspired on Adam A7X 
By: Huysz - https://www.huysz.com

Owning this NFT gives you access to the following utility:
1- High resolution version of the artwork
2- 15% discount on one product in category of NFT at ToneControl
3- Laptop skin with your NFT artwork
4- Mention on ToneControl social channel of choice
5- Mention in ToneControl newsletter
6- 1on1 with productspecialist
7- Access to ToneControl web3 community

Utility #2 untill #6 can be accessed only once a year, per NFT. That means that when you are a secondary owner of this NFT; some utility might NOT become accessible untill the start of the next calendar year.

Instructions how to redeem are viewable through unlockable content for owner in OpenSea.
